2.0.0 / 2014-09-02
==================

  * Use `mime-db`
  * Remove `.define()`

1.0.2 / 2014-08-04
==================

  * Set charset=utf-8 for `text/javascript`

1.0.1 / 2014-06-24
==================

  * Add `text/jsx` type

1.0.0 / 2014-05-12
==================

  * Return `false` for unknown types
  * Set charset=utf-8 for `application/json`

==================

  * Initial release
